The Dry Dock

Sparks fly as the harsh screeching of metal grinding fills the air and reverberates off the walls. Dozens of shipbuilders scurry over on scaffolding dangling above massive ships.

The Dry Dock is actually hundreds of small ports comprised of clean rooms, repair bays, and hangars. This particular dock is only notable for being attached to Loshe’s Office. Otherwise they all look roughly the same.

Cluster
Banquo
System
Miranda
Station
Prospero's Dream
